comment.body: Hi. What is ETZV website? Can I check if it works fro me?
@Lola: Sorry, will not open for me.

@Lola: "Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to eztv.io. PR_CONNECT_RESET_ERROR

    The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.
    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem." Cant open.
